name: Red Light Therapy Panel
description: Photobiomodulation devices emitting red (630-670nm) and near-infrared (810-850nm) light. Stimulates mitochondrial cytochrome c oxidase, increasing ATP production and reducing oxidative stress. Studied for skin health, wound healing, pain reduction, and cognitive function.
mechanisms: Nitric oxide release and blood flow

dosage.notes: Red (660nm) for skin/surface. NIR (850nm) penetrates deeper for joints, brain. Power density 50-100mW/cmÂ². Quality panels: Joovv, Mito Red, Platinum LED.

keyFindings: Improved skin complexion, collagen density, and wrinkle reduction in RCTs
Reduced joint pain and inflammation comparable to NSAIDs in some trials
Enhanced cognitive function and reduced TBI symptoms (Naeser et al.)
